issue.title: [Java] Ensure Support for modern Java versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15179](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15179). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
**Umbrella ticket for supporting recent java versions**

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15179?focusedCommentId=17495425) by Fabien (fabiche):*
Hello, any news on this ?

JDK 17 is the latest LTS and has been available for many months but Arrow still does not support it

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15179?focusedCommentId=17524183) by Carsten Haubold (chaubold):*
Hello,
JDK 17 support would be highly appreciated by us at [KNIME](http://knime.com), too. Is this on the roadmap? Any updates?
Thanks,
Carsten

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15179?focusedCommentId=17525326) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
Hi `[~chaubold]` there is a PR on https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15755 WIP to support JDK 17, please could you help me if this work for your side (consider: It is still pending to test adapter/orc module).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15179?focusedCommentId=17525451) by Carsten Haubold (chaubold):*
Thanks `[~dsusanibara]`! We'll have a look
